data.title: Burundi Cities Database
data.meta_description: A database of 17 prominent cities in Burundi.  Includes a city's latitude, longitude, province and other variables of interest. MIT license.  CSV, Excel and JSON formats. Comprehensive database available.
data.text:
Below is a list of 17 prominent cities in Burundi. Each row includes a city's latitude, longitude, province and other variables of interest. This is a subset of all 6,514 places in Burundi (and only some of the fields) that you'll find in our World Cities Database. We're releasing this data subset for free under an MIT license. You're free to use the data below for personal or commercial applications. The data below can be downloaded in .csv, .json, and .xlsx formats.

Notable Cities: The capital of Burundi is Gitega, which is in the province of Gitega. The largest city in Burundi is Bujumbura, with an urban population of 1,143,202.
